thread.title: Car overturns in roundabout crash in Livingston
thread.title_full: Car overturns in roundabout crash in Livingston

title: Car overturns in roundabout crash in Livingston
text:
Car overturns in roundabout crash in Livingston 19 January 2017 Close share panel Image copyright Abbie Kirkhope A driver has been taken to hospital after a car overturned following a two-vehicle crash in West Lothian. 
The man, who was driving a Hyundai Tucson, was taken to Edinburgh Royal Infirmary with minor injuries following the incident on Almondvale Boulevard in Livingston at 10:25. 
The crash, also involving a Vauxhall Zafira, happened at the roundabout's entrance to Asda. 
The road has now been reopened but one of the cars is still to be removed. Image copyright Abbie Kirkhope
